page.title: 07GAMES CHILDERN PLAY 2
page.content: hit becomes the thrower. Chariot it is similar to ball it. The players on roller skates are pulled along by players on foot. Lemon curd is oen of many skipping games. A long rope and one person at each end to turn the rope are needed. When the rope is turning someone jumps in and you sing "Lemon curd apple tart, what is the name of your sweetheart ABCDEFG ETC. If you are out on one of the letters that is the letter your sweethearts name begins with. Piggy back fights are played on grass. You need any even number of people as the game is played in pairsd. You get on your partners back and try ton push others off their partners back. The winner is the one who does not fall down Conkers You need to make a hole
